diff_analysis.evidence: The new code adds a size check before splitting the encrypted message (preventing out-of-bounds reads) and introduces an optional interactive path that base64-encodes/decodes data using safe Rust APIs. All buffer operations are bounds-checked by the standard library, and there are no raw pointers or unchecked indexing introduced. No unbounded resource allocation, null dereference, or classic buffer overflow patterns are present in the added code.
